statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ 4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -32 \\ 11 \\ -9 \\ -22 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ 4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -32 \\ 11 \\ -9 \\ -22 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
